content: blue sky fibers complimentary pattern royal oak cowl design by sarah kenyon no 1306l wild thyme 150g hank experience level - intermediate materials - woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 150g/370yds 1 hank - size 8 5mm 24 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - stitch markers - cable needle - tapestry needle size - one finished measurements - circumference 30 - height 14½ gauge - in double seed stitch 18 sts and 24 rnds = 4 abbreviations 2/1 lpc slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold to front royal oak cowl no 202033 p1 k2 from cable needle 2/1 rpc slip 1 stitch to cable needle hold to back k2 design by sarah kenyon pattern p1 from cable needle 2/2 lc slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold to front the royal oak cowl is cozy and cabled made with one 150g hank of k2 k2 from cable needle woolstok and will keep you warm on the coldest night 2/2 rc slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold to back k2 k2 from cable needle 3/3 twisted rib lc slip 3 stitches to cable needle hold to front p1 k1tbl p1 p1 k1tbl p1 from cable needle approx approximately bobble bind off co cast on cont continue complimentary pattern blue sky fibers double seed stitch multiple of 2 sts + 1 rnds 1 and 2 k1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end rnds 3 and 4 p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end repeat rnds 1-4 for double seed stitch k2 p2 rib multiple of 4 sts all rnds *k2 p2 repeat from * to end twist multiple of 6 sts rnds 1-3 p1 k1tbl p2 k1tbl p1 round 4 3/3 twisted rib lc rnds 5-8 p1 k1tbl p2 k1tbl p1 repeat rnds 1-8 for twist cowl co 156 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts work in k2 p2 rib for 5 rnds round 1 *work round 1 of double seed stitch over 13 sts pm p2 k1tbl p2 pm work round 1 of twist pm work round 1 of braid pm work round 1 of twist pm p2 k1tbl p2 pm repeat est established from * to end k knit round 2 *work round 2 of double seed stitch to m sm p2 k1tbl knit 1 stitch through the back loop k1tbl p2 sm work round 2 of twist sm work round 2 of meas measures braid sm work round 2 of twist sm p2 k1tbl p2 sm repeat p purl from * to end patt pattern cont as est until rnds 1-8 of twist and braid patts have pm place marker been worked 11 times piece meas approx 13½ repeat repeat work in k2 p2 rib for 5 rnds round s round s bobble loosely in patt sm slip marker slip marker from left needle to right needle st s stitch es finishing * repeat the directions between the asterisks as weave in ends
